h1_38: Advocate Health Care/Advocate Illinois Masonic Medical Center Program
p_63: Dashes ("-") indicate data for a particular field are not provided for this program in Residency Explorer. Reasons why data are not being provided can vary (e.g., they are not reported or available, they are not applicable, or they are based on an insufficient number of people for reporting purposes).

th_98: # of Residents Who Were Graduates of a Joint MD-PhD program
p_101: Our 2019 renovated department features a 3T MRI and a new SPECT/CT as well as two updated conference rooms to enhance the educational and patient experiences.Projects are underway for a new IR suite, a PET/CT, an open MRI and a fluoroscopy unit.While we are interested in all candidates, we focus energy on students in the Chicago Area or are originally from here and plan to return. If you have a non-Illinois address and are motivated to move, please reach out to our coordinator to be considered.
